verses.text: I will praise thee with my whole heart: Before the gods will I sing \add praise\add* unto thee.
I will worship towards thy holy temple, And praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: For thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.
In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, \add And\add* strengthenedst me \add with\add* strength in my soul.
All the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O \sc Lord\sc*, When they hear the words of thy mouth.
Yea, they shall sing in the ways of the \sc Lord\sc*: For great \add is\add* the glory of the \sc Lord\sc*.
Though the \sc Lord\sc* \add be\add* high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: But the proud he knoweth afar off.
Though I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: Thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, And thy right hand shall save me.
The \sc Lord\sc* will perfect that which concerneth me: Thy mercy, O \sc Lord\sc*, \add endureth\add* for ever: Forsake not the works of thine own hands.
